TestCase.name: testExplainDataStreamScan
TestCase.Resource:
== Abstract Syntax Tree == LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[DataStreamTable]])
== Optimized Logical Plan == DataStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testExplainTableSourceScan
TestCase.Resource:
== Abstract Syntax Tree == LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
== Optimized Logical Plan == TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
